channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged new

item.title: No new game option for the online editor?
item.description:
New user here; started today by signing in with my google account.

I click the 'quest' button and get taken to https://textadventures.co.uk/quest
I click the blue 'Go!' button and get taken to https://textadventures.co.uk/create/new

And then there isn't anything on the page.

Tried this on both Firefox and Chrome, and tried again after disabling addons like Ghosterly and Ad Block.

Also a side question: How is this service for group work on a single project?
